name: Until Christmas
description:
In this sweet game, you'll feel the blossoming of a strange friendship, and who knows something more...

Step into the shoes of the protagonist who was kidnapped very close to Christmas. Incredulous, she immerses herself in a world of magic, and meets two of the great lord Noel's assistants.

A game meant to be just a sweet adventure with three endings and four cute and fluffy cgs. This game is safe for all ages.

Kuan likes purple and always has a plan for everything. Although it doesn't look like it, he really likes Christmas, and cherishes his family.

Axel likes red. He is explosive with his emotions and all he has in life is Christmas, which is sometimes a good thing and sometimes prevents him from improving and using his knowledge.


- 11,000 words
- 3 animated scenarios
- 4 cute cgs
- Totally free
- Free for all audiences
- 3  sweets ends
- Duration from 30 minutes to one hour

------ THANKS FOR PLAY

------ HAPPY HOLIDAYS
